description:
When sessioning their favourite trails, this jersey will keep the next generation of Rampage riders looking the part. The Grom’s Altitude jersey has all the same tech as its adult counterparts… maybe even a little more. Sombrio uses fancy materials and a bit of science to help keep little rippers cool as they go for another lap.

  • Wicking material with a cooling xylitol treatment that cools down when wet
  • Microfiber wipe inside the hem helps keep your glasses or goggles clean
  • ¾ sleeves cover the top of pads and don’t ride up
  • Dropped back hem offers more coverage when in the ready position
name: Sombrio Grom's Altitude Jersey - Youths
